function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and microbial bioaerosols in a COVID-19 'surge' ward.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of COVID-19 and other airborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective air filtration and sterilization systems to remove and eradicate bioaerosols from the air.","Technologies":"Portable air filters with UV sterilization.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and other occupants of the COVID-19 'surge' ward.","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams, facility maintenance staff."}]}
